document_data.name: Altar of Shields
document_data.mainbody: The '''Altar of Shields''' was a shrine dedicated to [[Helm]] in the city of [[Tilverton]] in [[Cormyr]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Altar stood on a covered landing along the north-western [[Cormyr Stairs]] that connected the city's lower city and the [[Tilverton/Old Town|Old Town]].
